thread.title: Training camp roundup, first impression of Al-Farouq Aminu and more: Rip City Report podcast
thread.title_full: Training camp roundup, first impression of Al-Farouq Aminu and more: Rip City Report podcast | OregonLive.com

author: Joe Freeman | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Training camp roundup, first impression of Al-Farouq Aminu and more: Rip City Report podcast
text:
The Oregonian's Joe Freeman and the Trail Blazers' Casey Holdahl bring you another edition of their podcast, Rip City Report .
In the latest edition of the Rip City Report podcast, Joe and Casey touch on a host of topics, including:
• Has the Blazers' play in the preseason changed our expectations?
• Our first impression of Al-Farouq Aminu.
• Will Meyers Leonard and the Blazers agree to a contract extension before the season?
• The Blazers' chemistry has been good.
• Allen Crabbe's preseason play.
• Plus, Casey and Joe answer a host of listener questions, looking at CJ McCollum the point guard, the Tim Frazier-Phil Pressey training camp battle and more.
Rip City Report is also available on iTunes .
